contents.content: 第三部分 三种句子类型
第三节 拓展练习10题
But on the negative side, this type of organisation doesn't always act effectively.
Noise in classrooms can only exacerbate their difficulty in comprehending and processing verbal communication with other children and instructions from the teacher.

Hearing impairment or other auditory function deficit in young children can have a major impact on their development of speech and communication, resulting in a detrimental effect on their ability to learn at school.
All our subjects deemed the circle soft and the square hard.

According to archaeological evidence, at least 5,000 years ago, and long before the advent of the Roman Empire, the Babylonians began to measure time, introducing calendars to co-ordinate communal activities, to plan the shipment of goods and, in particular, to regulate planting and harvesting.
The technology raises the prospect of Britain becoming self-sufficient in renewable energy and drastically reducing its carbon dioxide emissions.
Such a record will allow you to present your linguistic credentials to academic institutions or potential employers around the world.

Modern teaching practices, the organisation of desks in the classroom, poor classroom acoustics, and mechanical means of ventilation such as air-conditioning units all contribute to the number of children unable to comprehend the teacher's voice.
The following is a description of an important study conducted by the Institute for Social Research designed to answer these questions.

Unprecedented construction of tens of thousands of monumental engineering projects designed to control floods, protect clean water supplies, and provide water for irrigation and hydropower brought great benefits to hundreds of millions of people.

contents.title: 但是不好的一面是，这种类型的组织不是一直都能高效地运转。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓”。 this type of organisation是主语，doesn't always act是谓语，effectively是状语。

contents.title: 教室里的噪声只会使得他们更难理解和处理同其他儿童的言语交流以及教师的教学内容。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。Noise是主语，in classrooms是介词短语作后置定语，修饰Noise；can only exacerbate是谓语；their difficulty是宾语。in comprehending and processing verbal communication with other children and instructions from the teacher是介词短语作后置定语，修饰difficulty。

contents.title: 小孩子的听力损伤或其他听觉功能缺陷会对他们的言语和交流能力的发展产生重大影响，从而也会对他们在学校的学习能力产生消极作用。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。Hearing impairment和other auditory function deficit是并列主语，in young children是介词短语作后置定语，修饰主语；can have是谓语；a major impact是宾语。on their development of speech and communication是介词短语作后置定语，修饰impact；resulting in a detrimental effect是现在分词短语作结果状语；on their ability to learn at school是介词短语作后置定语，修饰a detrimental effect。

contents.title: 所有的受试者都认为圆形代表柔软，方形代表坚硬。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾补”。All our subjects是主语，deemed是谓语，the circle和the square是由and连接的两个并列的宾语，soft和hard分别是这两个宾语的补足语。

contents.title: 根据考古学的证据，至少在5?000年以前，早在罗马帝国出现之前，巴比伦人就已经开始计时了：他们引入日历来统筹公共活动，计划货物装运，尤其是根据它来安排耕种与收割。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。the Babylonians是主语，began是谓语，to measure time是宾语。According to archaeological evidence, at least 5,000 years ago, and long before the advent of the Roman Empire是三个状语；introducing calendars是现在分词短语作状语，to co-ordinate communal activities, to plan the shipment of goods 和to regulate planting and harvesting都是不定式短语作目的状语。

contents.title: 这项技术为英国可再生能源的自给自足开辟了广阔的前景，同时其二氧化碳的排放量也大幅降低。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。The technology是主语，raises是谓语，the prospect of Britain是宾语。becoming self-sufficient in renewable energy 和drastically reducing its carbon dioxide emissions是并列的现在分词短语作后置定语，修饰the prospect of Britain。

contents.title: 你可以将这样一份成绩单作为语言方面的凭证，向学术机构或者全球潜在的雇主出示。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾补”。Such a record是主语， will allow是谓语，you是宾语，to present your linguistic credentials to academic institutions or potential employers是不定式短语作宾语补足语，around the world是介词短语作后置定语，修饰potential employers。

contents.title: 现代教学方法、教室的桌椅安排、劣质的教室音响以及诸如空调等机械通风设备都是造成一些孩子无法听清老师声音的诱因。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾”。Modern teaching practices, the organisation of desks, poor classroom acoustics, and mechanical means of ventilation是并列的主语，contribute to是谓语，the number of children是宾语， unable to comprehend the teacher's voice是形容词短语作后置定语，修饰children。

contents.title: 下面所述是由社会研究院实施的一项重要研究，该研究是专为回答这些问题而设计的。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+系+表”。The following是主语，is是系动词，a description是表语，of an important study是介词短语作后置定语，修饰a description。conducted by the Institute for Social Research是过去分词短语作后置定语，修饰study；designed to answer these questions是过去分词短语作后置定语，也是修饰study。

contents.title: 以前所未有的规模建造了好几万具有里程碑意义的水利工程项目，以控制洪水，保护清洁的水源，为灌溉和水力发电供水，这使无数人从中受益。

contents.content: 语法破解：这是一个简单句，全句的基本结构是：“主+谓+宾+宾”。Unprecedented是形容词作定语，修饰主语construction；of tens of thousands of monumental engineering projects是介词短语作后置定语，修饰主语construction；designed to control floods, protect clean water supplies, and provide water for irrigation and hydropower是过去分词短语作后置定语，修饰projects；其中的to control floods, protect clean water supplies和provide water for irrigation and hydropower是三个不定式短语，作目的状语；brought是谓语，great benefits是直接宾语，hundreds of millions of people是间接宾语。
